attributes.action: put british citizens first for once and sort the mess we 're in
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: our government has helped other countries out by homing them, giving them benefits, jobs etc causing real english citezens to lose jobs homes etc. this is NOT a racial petiton or anthing of the sort. we just want our government to put us first, help us and get us out your mess put us as priority for homes jobs etc. after all this is england if the situation was vice versa there countries wouldnt help us!!

rejection.details: Your petition articulates a point of view, rather than requesting any tangible action from Government. Please resubmit your petition requesting a specific action from Government.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
